value.title: Making Safe Self-Driving Cars Is Really, Really Difficult, So Lyft Just Sold Its Self-Driving Tech
value.excerpt: Lyft just sold their self-driving tech to a Toyota subsidiary. Uber bailed out of their effort in 2020. Tesla drivers over-rely on self-driving tech with disastrous results. Meanwhile, companies continue to wrestle with autonomous driving tech.

value.title: AWS DeepRacer device software now open source
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer is the fastest way to get started with machine learning (ML). You can train reinforcement learning (RL) models by using a 1/18th scale autonomous vehicle in a cloud-based virtual simulator and compete for prizes and glory in the global AWS DeepRacer League. value.title: Self-Driving Truck Company Plus Demonstrates Commitment To Sustainability With Eco-Friendly Collaborators
value.excerpt: Ranked Industry Analyst Patrick Moorhead dives deeper into Plus, the self-driving truck company, committing to sustaining eco-friendly collaborators.

value.title: Waymo’s leadership shift spotlights self-driving car challenges
value.excerpt: Waymo's recent executive shuffle signals driverless technology has a ways to go before a robust self-driving car industry becomes reality.

value.title: EU outlines ambitious artificial intelligence regulations focused on risky uses
value.excerpt: Risky uses of artificial intelligence that threaten people's safety or rights such as live facial scanning should be banned or tightly controlled, European Union officials said Wednesday.

value.title: Self-driving car sensor startup Luminar hires Tesla, Intel veterans
value.excerpt: Self-driving car sensor startup Luminar Technologies Inc on Wednesday said it had hired Tesla Inc and Intel Corp veterans for legal and investor relations positions.

value.title: Britain's driverless car ambitions hit speed bump with insurers
value.excerpt: Britain's goal to be a leader in adopting self-driving cars could backfire unless automakers and government regulators spell out the current limitations of the technology, insurance companies warn.

value.title: Self-driving car conundrum: Tesla's latest crash raises concerns about Autopilot safety claims
value.excerpt: The belief that self-driving cars are a reality is worrying watchdogs, who say that some people are too confident in them after another Tesla crash.

value.title: Two dead in self-driving Tesla crash after hitting tree, bursting into flames
value.excerpt: Two men were killed in Spring, Texas after officials said a Tesla was driving itself when it ran off road, hit a tree and burst into flames.

value.title: Everything Elon Musk Has Said About Tesla's Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has had a lot to say about Tesla's Autopilot feature, which may have been connected to two deaths in an accident on Saturday in Texas.

value.title: Bird’s-Eye View To Provide Self-Driving Cars With Some Needed Computational Omnipresence
value.excerpt: Latest tech allows for a bird's-eye view of a driving scene, referred to as computational omnipresence, which could be a huge boon toward the advent of self-driving cars.

value.title: Volvo will provide cars for Didi’s autonomous vehicle division

value.title: One Board, All Platforms: ZF Drives Vehicle Intelligence with ProAI Supercomputer
value.excerpt: The intelligence of future vehicles will be controlled by a few extremely powerful central computers. They will run the computationally intensive software functions that control critical vehicle domains.

value.title: Shanghai Auto Show: Chinese internet search giant Baidu to supply its Apollo self-driving system to 1 million cars in 3-5 years
value.excerpt: Baidu expects to supply its Apollo autonomous driving system to 1 million cars in the next three to five years.
